PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-13922009-08-04,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of GUY BOURGEOIS of St-Bruno, Quebec, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
